data.title: You star Penn Badgley says 'My past relationship with Blake Lively saved me from…'
data.meta_description: Penn Badgley and Blake Lively dated each other between 2007-2010. The actor reveals how that relationship saved him.
data.text:
You returns with its fourth season on Netflix. Penn Badgley, who plays the lead role in You, speaks about his past relationships and goes down the memory lane about his breakout role as Dan Humphrey in Gossip Girl. He speaks about his on and off-screen relationship with Blake during the Gossip Girl shooting. The duo broke up in 2010 and dated for close to three years.

advertisement

PENN ON HIS PAST RELATIONSHIP WITH BLAKE

Speaking about the fame he received during that time, Badgley shared that those years were ‘fun and fast-paced with a dark undercurrent that would bottom out in my later 20s." He specified that he never struggled with substance use and in ways Blake helped her. “Blake didn't drink, and I think our relationship in some ways saved me from forcing myself to go down that road."

READ | You Season 4 Trailer is out. Penn Badgley's Joe is getting stalked in new season

'GOING THROUGH SPIRITUAL CRISIS'

He revealed that the darkness he experienced was a result of a “spiritual crisis." He shared, “Like anybody who experiences some degree of fame and wealth," he stated, "I was presented with the universal truth that not only does it not make your life better or easier, it actually can greatly complicate things, and make you quite unhappy. I was never anything that I would define as suicidal at all, but I was certainly in despair.”

The actor then found happiness in his family with wife Domino Kirke, their son James Badgley, 2, and his stepson Cassius Riley, 14, followed by his career.

You is also co-produced by Penn.
